chapters.title: Chapter 18: A Chat With Siuan
chapters.info: Sereille Bagand, p. 435 (524)—Late Aes Sedai of the White Ajah. She was Mistress of Novices when Adeleas and Vandene were novices, and was later raised to the Amyrlin Seat. She was a legend for her harshness. While she was Mistress of Novices, she commented that Vandene was too harsh toward her students. She was considered one of the hardest-tempered Amyrlins in recent history. Her name has been the by-word of iron-handed strictness in the Tower for a hundred years. Egwene worries that some day her name will be used to frighten novices in place of Sereille's. See also Amyrlin Seat; Mistress of Novices.
